title: Microsoft Stream: Edit the transcript text directly in the UI in Stream (on SharePoint)
description: This feature allows you to edit the transcript text of a Stream (on SharePoint) video directly in the transcript pane. The feature also works with any videos stored in SharePoint or OneDrive for business that contain transcripts. To edit a transcript, you must have edit permission to the video. Transcript editing helps you improve the quality of your transcript by quickly correcting minor mistakes such as misinterpreted acronyms, names, or incorrect punctuation. Â Changes in the transcript are also reflected in the closed captions.
